oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Automobile Electric Service Co., from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo, published in the Nashville Times (1940), about the Automobile Electric Service Company, with the caption “Car Trouble?--Then Drive Right In.” The business is cited in the 1941 City Directory at 168 9th Avenue N, Charles C. Forehand and James A. Wright. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Forehand, Charles C.; Wright, James A.
Automobile Electric Service (Nashville, Tenn.)
